answers.answer: My midwife said as long as your within an inch or two of the week you are on you're fine. I've measured small my entire pregnancy and I'm 38 weeks goin on 39 weeks. But I did not have gestational diabetes.

question: I have gestational diabetes and I go twice a week for non-stress tests at the hospital and I go once a week to my midwife and today she told me I'm measuring 34 weeks. But I'm 36 weeks pregnant. Is that bad? He has been lowering so would that be why?
title: I'm 36 weeks. But I measured 34 weeks?
